mdRecord.dcterms:title: VerV soap tissues
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Velso Products Co. [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contains instructions for use on the box. This artifact was used in the physical exhibit "Coming Clean: Hand Washing and Public Health" by Addeane Caelleigh and Normajean Hultman.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Hygiene--Hand washing
